rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a foyer that integrates a minimalistic design incorporating natural materials. The space is designed to receive ample daylight and provide effective ventilation.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious living area designed for comfort and social gatherings, with large windows for natural light. The room is oriented to the South-West to align with Vastu.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: An open-plan dining area integrated within the living room space. Ample natural lighting is provided through strategically placed windows.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern kitchen with efficient layout, open ventilation system, and access to natural light from the North. Vastu principles suggest placing the kitchen in the South-East for prosperity.

rooms.name: Guest Room
rooms.description: A cozy guest room with a balcony for privacy and natural ventilation. The room is designed to maximize daylight.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom with an attached balcony for extra light and ventilation. Designed as the primary relaxation area, incorporating Vastu alignment in the North-East.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: A contemporary door design, ensuring secure and aesthetic entry. Complies with local building codes.

openings.name: Front Windows
openings.description: Large windows designed to maximize natural light and ventilation, oriented according to Vastu guidelines.

openings.name: Balcony Openings
openings.description: Balcony openings for both master bedroom and guest room designed for enhanced natural ventilation, adhering to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: A compact bathroom for guest convenience. Designed to ensure privacy and efficient use of space.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: A spacious master bathroom with integrated storage and natural ventilation. Follows Vastu guidelines for wellness.

openings.name: Roof Ventilation Opening
openings.description: Ventilation openings on the rooftop to ensure effective air circulation in accordance with local codes.

openings.name: Rooftop Terrace Access
openings.description: A staircase leading from the living area to a spacious rooftop terrace designed for relaxation and social activities, compliant with Vastu principles.
